summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Garden City is a census-designated place  in Glasscock County, Texas, United States. It lies near the center of the county, about 27 miles south of Big Spring. Garden City serves as the Glasscock County seat, and at the 2010 Census, had a population of 334. The ZIP code is 79738.
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07.
title: Garden City, Texas
